name: Wind Rider (itch)
description:
Reign over the mountains

Soar in around the mountains of this island, as you rack up points and aim to get the highest score possible! Keep yourself gliding as long as possible by flying smart, and making the most use of your Boost-Pack to give you that extra OOMPH. when you need it the most! 

High speed point scoring or a relaxed flight around the island

How you play is up to you; do you want to go as fast as you can and get as many points as you can before you hit the ground, or do you just want to enjoy the scenery and fly around for a bit? Play how YOU want to! 

So simple!

Simple controls mean anyone can pick this game up and play, however mastery of it could take some time! (Unless you play the heck out of flight sims!) 

Mouse and Keyboard are recommended as controller support isn't available in Windrider.
